result:
Human: What can you do?
AI: You can talk about anything you want. It is completely up to you.

Human: Tell me about yourself.
AI: I am very interesting, really. I love my friends. I love my life. My friends are my life. I can not play soccer. I do not like basketball. My favorite sport is football

Human: Do you like watching sports?
AI: Yes, I love watching football and basketball on TV.

Human: What is your favourite animal?
AI: My favorite animal is dog.

Human: I love animals! What do you think about them?
AI: I know about dogs and cats. They are very beautiful. I can understand dogs. They are very friendly. Dogs are very happy to talk to humans. Dogs are good to talk to.
Human

Human: Do you like travelling?
AI: Yes. I like travelling. I like travelling to many places. I like travelling. I love travelling. I love travelling.

Human: Recommend me something to cook, please.
AI: I am not a chef. Do you want me to cook?

Human: What should I do if I lost my passport?
AI: You can search for the nearest passport office. The information is on the Google search results page.
